website_summaries.verdict: Perfect choice for dogs who like to burrow into a covered bed that has a low roof.
pros: Doesn't take up a lot of vertical space in the room with the nest-like design
Uses Sherpa fabric in the lining to create an extremely comfortable feel
Contains high-end fabrics and seams to ensure it'll stand up to rough treatment
cons: Not every dog will be willing to burrow into the tight fit of this covered bed

customer_reviews.title: Pet pig approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: pigs love to snuggle into Blankets when sleeping so this bed was is perfect for them!
customer_reviews.author: Melinduh

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My nine year-old bull terrier is simply in love with this bed. I had thought buying it in the warmer months would mean he wouldn't use it much, but he's in it every day. He tries to get as far in the back of the bed as he possibly can, and he often is asleep immediately after burying himself inside. I often bring up how happy I have been with this purchase, and my dog's use of it is proof of its worth.
customer_reviews.author: RileyD

customer_reviews.title: 50 lb couch potato gave up his spot on the couch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old 50 lb pit mix who loves to be under blankets. I bought a new sectional and wanted to keep him off. it worked! He loves his new "pod". The 36 inch size leaves him plenty of room to stretch out. It only took a couple of days for him to learn to get inside of it. Well worth the cost for me!
customer_reviews.author: Donnagsw

customer_reviews.title: Close but not quite
customer_reviews.text: The design isn't quite correct. The hoop in the bed we recieved does not create an opening as shown in the picture. It also does not have enough material to create the little cubby as shown. The hoop should be taller to create a larger opening and there should excess material for the cubby portion. Unless we hold it open for her, she sleeps on top of it. In every othe way, it's a very nice bed and. The intended purpose of it misses the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bed. I did take out some of the stuffing and will replace it later. It was just too full for my puppy to get inside. Now he loves it. He is so content being nestled inside his bed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great bed to keep your pooch warm in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy. My dog is 45lbs, long legs, and probably could fit two of her in there. It only took a couple times of sticking a treat all the way in the back for her to learn to lift the support to scoot in on her own. The bed is nicely plush and the inside gets very warm. The only down side is that it 'sheds' a bit at first. The faux sheep fur material on the inside portion pills up. We've had the bed about a month and the shedding seemed to have stopped after a couple weeks. Definitely nothing to keep you from getting it. This is perfect for our dog for the Colorado winters. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: We searched for the perfect thing to free us up and this was it
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Snoozer. Our older dog loves to burrow in the blankets. He would whine at us until we held up the blanket so he could go under. We searched for the perfect thing to free us up and this was it! We bought a small and large and our younger smaller dog wants to be in the big one too. So now we got another large one. They really are great, the dogs love them. It has also helped to get the dogs out of our bed on occasion. We have a 25 lb boston terrier and while he fits in the small it's super cozy. He prefers the Large.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for nervous dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: Miracle!! My dog that struggles with intense anxiety issues LOVES this bed. What a great find! The x-large size is enormous--great value. My dog did pull out the plastic part that keeps the opening up within the first day, but he likes it better now that it's more of a sleeping bag/bed without the opening standing up. He burrows in there and is happy as a clam! It's big enough for me to climb in--trust me, I know this from personal experience ;). Such a great find! If you have a dog that suffers with anxiety, or loves to burrow, you must purchase this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren1370

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you have a burrowing breed, this is a must to prevent them from burrowing into your furniture. My dogs love this. It is well made as they "dig" frequently and only a bit of fuzz comes off. I have had 3 so far and only one was ever torn with pretty heavy use. The price has been climbing on these. I hope that stops. Well-made product. (Remove the canopy bar for best results) My dogs actually removed the canopy support within a wk of getting their first bed. Now I just cut a slit and remove it. They like to be under the cover more.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Schmahl

customer_reviews.title: she does love it - she likes to dive into the pita ...
customer_reviews.text: While this bed did not magically solve our "dog sleeping in our bed" problem, she does love it - she likes to dive into the pita pocket and also lays on top. The workmanship is great. we got the x-large for our 50 pound pit mix. She can curl up in a very tight ball, or stretch out to about 5 ft long, so, while she probably could have fit just fine in the large, we opted for the larger option so she can fully stretch out and lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed!
customer_reviews.text: so im a first time buyer with this company and all the retail chains don't have anything that's this high end. I would have preferred to have an authentic sherpa Linning and not the faux stuff. the polyester cotton blend is soft (hand wash in cold water).... but not as soft as genuine sherpa wool. I do LOVE the framing rim that holds up the "cave" entrance. My little fur princess is sitting nice and pretty in her new bed. She loves to look down on us from her new throne.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cozy pup = well rested family!!
customer_reviews.text: 25 lb Blabbe (Black Lab/Beagle) nestled right in and was naping happily in his cave within 2 hrs of delivery. He has plenty of room. Small was definitely too small for him. Large is very roomy. (Why there is no medium I don't know). Olive is not dark red, as pictured (!), but what you would expect. Micro-suede easy to clean and tastefully neutral (inoffensive and hides dirt. Our doggy sleeps best when snuggling under the covers at night but made for not such a great sleep for the rest of us!! Cave was suggested by friend who also has a blanket burrower. Sturdy and good quality. Recommended for getting a cuddler off your bed or the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: NoSlouch

customer_reviews.title: Super fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my 70 lb pittie mix who likes to go under the blankets with me, however, he's still afraid of this cave bed. Eventually, he'll be trained to sleep in it instead of hogging all of my covers! Really well made and packaged. Even if my dogs don't like going in it, there is a huge area on top to lie on. I purchased the XL and I think for any dog over 50 lbs, that's the way to go. Haven't had any issues with the hoop insert on top.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA KASS

customer_reviews.title: A quality dog bed that is worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but they are worth it! I have a small one for in my Yorkshire Terrier’s kennel and a larger one for in the family room. He uses them every day. The quality is great. Do not hesitate to purchase. The heavy duty metal/brass zipper is a real plus because my dog chews and ruins anything with a plastic zipper. He does not touch this zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Chili Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Doberman LOVES it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If anyones dog is blanket/warm obsessed... this is a must have. Ended up buying a second one for our other “always cold” 2 year old doberman, too, after realizing how much our 5 year old dobie loves it. We tried going with just the large at first (because they get themselves into such tiny little balls when they sleep), but it was way to small for them to actually climb into it themselves and get all adjusted! At first you’ll pry have to teach/train your dobie how to use it! We used treats! We opened up the top and threw the treat into the way back of it and kept praising him for going inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Small size review
customer_reviews.text: I added a photo to show what a small size looks for an 18 pound Daschund. It’s perfect! Actually more room than needed, I may put a little blanket in there for her but she immediately took to it and is snoring 2 minutes after unpacking it. Other reviewers typically mention the large size and I was worried about the small so I wanted to help others out who may have the same concern. Also some people say the stuffing is too much but I think it’s perfect the way it is. It is very soft and plush, it appears to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: chris staton

customer_reviews.title: DOG LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard several times about this Cozy Cave on Facebook, but finally gave in to order one. My German Shorthair LOVED it from the get go! The only problem is that when they get in they have to push up on the top to get in and get comfy (and covered). It was only a few days that the side ripped out, but he still loves the bed, AND luckily keeps him THERE vs in MY bed at least halfway through the night. But I'm working on sewing up the sides that pulled apart very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for dogs with anxiety!!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever right reviews, but felt compelled to do so with this product! My 5lb (full grown) Jack Russell Terrier suffers from MAJOR anxiety. Like purposefully shuts the door on herself and then barks at it kind. Since she was a puppy (she’s now 8) she has always clung to me. If I wouldn’t allow her to sleep in our bed at night, she would sit on the floor and shake, pace and cry. I decided to give this bed a try, and can happily report we got OUR bed back! She loves her new bed and burrows to the furthest corner every time! Highly recommend for dogs who have anxiety!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The greatest dog bed on the market!
customer_reviews.text: We just received our new dog bed tonight, and ALREADY my dog is all tucked in! She has always been a burrow-er, so I knew this was the bed for her. She was a little perplexed at first, but after placing a treat in the back a time or two, she had it figured out! When I put her favorite blanket in with the last treat, she was totally “into” it...sorry, bad pun! We are totally HAPPY CAMPERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  W.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Dogs That Like To Be In A Bed Instead Of ON It
customer_reviews.text: I have Italian Greyhounds and these guys just love being under something. It's actually the third of these beds that I've bought. It also looks neat and nice in my living room. The only reason I didn't give five stars for everything is that I'm in my 80's, widowed and living alone and the bed is somewhat heavy and bulky for me to handle. However, it's worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Iggylil

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy Cave
customer_reviews.text: They love their cave. It's getting pretty cold here, and they're digging how cozy this bed is. I have two 30-35 pound Frenchies, and the XL is definitely large enough for them. They would have probably fit in the Large, but I didn't want to take a chance. The only issue they have is that they can't figure out how to burrow in themselves, I have to lift up the front for them so they can snuggle inside. They're not burrowers by nature, I guess. Maybe the next generation of these beds will have a stand-up front flap. But even so, this was a great winter purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: I want one for myself!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the Large size for my two mini dachshunds, figuring they can snuggle together. The inside is surprisingly tight for such a big bed, but they love to burrow inside. The quality is outstanding - the cover is soft and resists scratches, stains and drool, and the inside is soft, warm, and sturdy. The only downside is that it is very large and hard to travel with. If they made this for humans I would get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JenM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: The only bed my dog doesn’t destroy! It helps that the bottom fabric is the same strong fabric as the top and that a heavy duty zipper is used. My dog has destroyed at least 7 other beds of various types. She also loves that she can burrow inside it and hide her toys. She didn’t like the plastic insert that kept the blanket part open and she somehow removed it without damaging the bed itself. The inner core does not absorb any bad odors having a slight odor of wood chips when removed from the cover. I’ve already purchased a second one! (Double check directly on PetCo website as prices may differ if you have PetCo coupons or rewards)
customer_reviews.author: Dubsee

customer_reviews.title: A must have bed for Italian Greyhounds.
customer_reviews.text: Snoozer Cozy Cave is a must have for Italian Greyhound owners! My Dogs Jesse and Joseppi can be found curled up inside napping and happy.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my snuggly pup.
customer_reviews.text: My 40lb dog loves the large and there is plenty of room to spare. It took a few try’s of throwing treats inside to get him comfortable going in and laying down. We got it to ween him off of the couch do to a new baby due to arrive in August. Our pup sometimes now chooses his comfy bed instead of snuggling us on the couch without us asking him to go to his “cave”. This l was our goal for him to enjoy it and not feel banished. The green color was just as expected. It is a great size and well constructed. No complaints. We have had it for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: alyssarae

customer_reviews.title: Cave Bed superb quality.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I set up the bed, my frenchton fell in love with it. She literally replaced her existing bed with this one. We set it in any room and she follows it. See for yourself. I have noticed that she digs with her paws and some of the shirpa fibers come out, don’t know how it will hold up when I wash it, but for now, no regrets. I love seeing my dog in this bed, she looks adorable, most of all she loves it. Compared it to other cave beds at pet shops and nothing compared to this quality. Which speaks for itself. The top arch starts in place very strong. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: maya nieves

customer_reviews.title: Whippet Bed
customer_reviews.text: 7 months in with the bed. Still looks new. Perfect for my boy. His FAVORITE bed. Great size for whippet puppy. Allows them to grow into it as adults. Was worried he wouldn’t find his way in it, but they figure it out. The hoop came out after the first washing, but it’s better without the hoop. He can go in and have some privacy when the flap falls over his face. Pros: soft. Minimum shedding of material Multi use (can flip it over a just a pad when it’s warm) Washable Gives pup some privacy Cons: Price (but VERY worth it) Hoop comes out (better without it) Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate-BUY this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dog bed!! Our dog prefers to be covered at night we used to have a blanket on top of the dog bed but it was such a pain. We bought this hoping our 80lb Silver Lab would take the to “cove bed”. She LOVES it easy to get into, and was super easy to take out the plastic tube that holds the top Up to wash. It comes Very packed with stuffing.... we ending up taking some out so there was a little more room for her to get in and get comfy. BUY this bed it is amazing! Our 120lb dog is next on the list to get one
customer_reviews.author: kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, but kind of high in the middle - she rolls off to the sides
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. Our beagle loves to hide things in it - mostly the things she's not supposed to have! If I could change anything about it, it would be to make a slight depression in the center. It's highest in the middle so when she lays down she automatically rolls off to the edge and falls 'off' the cusion. Otherwise it's a great bed!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Gia Pia Sleepy Head Loves Her New Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Gia likes to be right in the middle of things and will bark until I put her up on my desk while I am working. I purchased this bed for her to be in while I work and it is perfect. It fits right on my desk and Gia snuggles herself right in and takes a nap. No barking and no trying to get into my lap! She likes to get in as far as she can so just her little head can be seen. She passes out too, I mean snoring and the whole deal. Keeps her super warm too. Gia is a 7lb Malshi and the size small bed is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed. Our pup loves this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Our pup loves with thing! He is a hound/lab mix sitting at 50 pounds. We ordered him the Large and he fits great with a little room to spare. Even though he loves to borough it did take some awkward staring matches between him and the bed as well as some light training to get him able to enter unassisted. Once he got the entry procedure sorted it has been love ever since. A little costly but it's made a good material, great zipper and easy to wash once you figure out how to get the top cover arch support removed. He's happy with it, we're happy with it. It's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy and handy to have.
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be the perfect pet bed for my family. I had to remover the plastic brace and make it flat, because my silly pups were afraid of the cave. We just laid a blanket or two over it, and they are in love. We call it “The Cloud” because it is soft enough that they sink in. I should mention that we have 3 Chihuahuas and a cat. All the dogs sleep on it, but they give it up to the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shelton

customer_reviews.title: My 6 pound yorkie, who loves to be under ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 pound yorkie, who loves to be under the covers, would not use this bed. The top does not stay up and even with putting food in the "cave" to try and get her used to it, unless I held up the top she would not get the food. This picture is deceiving. After 6 months, I threw it out since it was just taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this bed. It probably comes with a rigid pole to keep the flap open but it's easily removed and my baby prefers the bed with the flap floppy 🤷‍♀️. It's very easy to clean, fluffy and soft. Excellently sewn and durable (he's part Jack russell and likes to chew). Overall a great investment
customer_reviews.author: amanda brock

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for burrowing dogs
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a dachshund/ jack russel mix from the pound and noticed he loved to sleep under a blanket i left on my couch. So I did some research and found these beds for burrowing dogs. He absolutely loves it. He spends hours a day sleeping in there with his little nose poking out so he can keep an eye on the world. It's expensive, but worth every penny. The set up was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Farrimond

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfortable - Huge
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog bed! I may take a nap in it this afternoon, of course I will have to fight my 2 dogs over it. My <30lb dogs are in love with this cozy large bed. It's closer to the ground than the couch, so no jumping up/down necessary. Its very cushy - great for sitting at a lower level with my dogs. I am 5'4" and can snuggle up inside it if I'm feeling like a snooze. My genius dogs haven't realized the amazing bed has a pocket for snoozing - but they still love it and take turns using it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE it! BUT Amazon should state the product was a return!
customer_reviews.text: Edit for new shipment: see pic. For this much money I should be NOTIFIED I WOULD BE GETTING A PREVIOUS RETURN!!! If another dog peed on this it could be an issue and I am stuck with a $100 dog bed I can't use. I am so mad. I have two beds and love the product but should be notified if the product has been returned. My gosh my bowsers loved these!! I should get a video of my older one running full blast and divinging into bed.. It is really funny. He loves his cave. I have washed these 5 times (dried outside) and they hold up nicely.(my puppy peed on everything for a while)
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs who burrow
customer_reviews.text: I have a Whippet, a breed that burrows, and he loves cave beds. He's used them since he was a puppy and nothing else compares to this Snoozer. I can bring him to work with me, so I bought a second Snoozer so he had a place to sleep while I worked. My dog likes to go insides, and while standing, spin in 10-15 circles before laying down. Even with that, there are no tears or durability issues. I've never tried washing it, but I've heard it's easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Crank

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Took her about a week to realize what it was. She likes to sleep on my dirties so I rubbed my shirts and socks over the inside. I also threw some treats inside to get her used to it. After a week she got it and now LOVES it! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Rdawg

customer_reviews.title: Hound dog heaven
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but my wife ordered it for our 70lb black and tan hound anyway. He needed a comfy spot after a good day with me in the field. He stepped right in and has spent every night since in that taco. Only downside is it gets super hot because he is in and out all night. Flaps his ears to cool down when he comes out and it makes a racket.
customer_reviews.author: whatesleistheretodo

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL OF THE product and thePACKING!!
customer_reviews.text: We made a horrible mistake......my wife opened the box and saw the product and took it out of the box and threw the box and what she thought was extra packing away. My wife felt that the product did not look as "fluffy" as it shown on line....here to find the "extra packing" was the mattress for the bed----the box had no indication the product came in TWO sections--
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: German shorthaired pointers need this bed!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a German Shorthaired Pointer you need this bed! I have 2 of these and my 3 GSP’s love them! My oldest GSP loves being warm and sleeping under the blankets at night. When she’s cold she gets in her cozy cave. I now have 2 GSP puppies and they both love this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog LOVES this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary about spending this much money on a dog bed, but very happy to see my dog gravitate to it immediately! Before we got this, he'd always burrow himself under blankets or the sofa-cover, but now he goes right to the bed and snuggles himself way into it. Only comment - we bought the Large bed based on his weight (60 lbs), and it was a little too small for him to get into. We returned it for the XL bed, which is just perfect - plenty of room for him to get way into it and move around comfortably. Wonderful idea and design - we couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this bed so much I had to buy a second one! We bought this so my dog who insists on being under the covers at night would sleep in her own bed instead of the human bed. It worked like a charm! So much so that our other dog who doesn't burrow wanted one too. After we got him one it took him awhile to want to actually sleep inside instead of on top, but now he goes in to sleep immediately each night. Great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Nora D

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase we've made for our dog in two years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the single best purchase we've ever made for our dog. Not kidding! She LOVES this thing -- so much that we actually have two now, one for upstairs and one for down. She snuggles in this thing endlessly and she sleeps in it at night. She burrows in it when she's tired, sad or not feeling well. The fact that it's machine washable is a blessing, as she eats her treats in there, too! It remains soft and fluffy even after washing. I would buy this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog bed.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dog bed. It's made of high quality materials. The only problem with it is that my dog doesn't like it. I bought it because she likes to root into sofas and blankets. But she won't touch this for some reason. I think it's my picky dog, not the product. If she liked it, I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doxie loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My doxie after sniffing around it then ignoring for 15 minutes decided to give it a try. He settled right in and went to sleep. Now, if I could just stop him from dragging it from one place to another, that would be great. A doxie is gonna do what a doxie is going to do!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: 3 is company
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I expected but so awesome. I have pugs and frenchies and 3 can get into it at once. They love it and so do I. It is easy to assemble don't let it intimidate you or make harder than it really is. I would buy again and I may get another for my daughters dog.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie W.

customer_reviews.title: Well made dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Great dog bed if you have a dog that loves to burrow. It's sturdy and well made, last one lasted over a year. To wash you have to take plastic rod out and then take out stuffing insert, not too bad. A little pricey but this holds up for a long time and if you have a burrowing dog, they won't want to leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs personal cave
customer_reviews.text: My dog suffers from anxiety & needs to be covered while sleeping, or if thundering. I saw this bed & thought it’s worth a try. She loves it. Her own cave. Eva is 55lbs but I got the XL bed so her “babies” that she sleeps with can fit with her...plenty of room. I could have gotten away with the L, but this is just perfect. Super fast delivery & packages very well. In the picture you can see her little head sticking out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a very happy fur baby!!
customer_reviews.text: My Prissy has anxiety and loves to cover her head with her blankets. I got tired of her dragging the blankets all over the house and spreading even more dog hair. I decided to try this bed in hopes of getting rid of the blankets. I’m thrilled to say she loves it! The X Large is a little pricey but it’s worth it. The material is thick and so is the cushion/bed that is inserted. It’s not made with cheap materials and is very sturdy. Great buy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: pamela atcheson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great produce. The first was a small she still ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. she is a "street dog" from Costa Rica and hates the cold and rain. It didn't take her long to figure out that she could open it herself to get in when she wants or when it's warm she gets on top. It washes really well. I had to cut the end to slide the rod out to wash. I put it back after it's washed and dried. I bought the large one by mistake but she loves getting all the way down in there. This is a great produce. The first was a small she still uses in the living room, the large in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this bed! With two big dogs who seem to get cold in warm weather, this is the best bed! No more Sharing of our bed to keep them warm! Easy to clean, plenty of room, well worth the price for their happiness! Would most definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Jayne Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE their snoozer, but unfortunately were able to pull out the plastic framing that holds open the cave within a few weeks. They still use it and love it, but it doesnt stay propped open like before. Easy to clean and both my GSP dogs fit inside the XL
customer_reviews.author: Sydney McGagin

customer_reviews.title: The pup loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: The pup loves this bed! It's great for the burrowers. Sometimes she will leave the snuggling session on the couch to go upstairs and take a nap in her own bed! I've had this for 3 or 4 months so far, and while it's not as full and fluffy as it was when I first got it, the bed still has plenty of cushion for my dog. I have a 55-lb, short and stocky pit, and I bought the x-large size for her so she could really burrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love this! it works with the rigid 'clamshell' framing in place but I took it out to wash the cover once and found the dogs (and even the cat) don't mind using it without. i have a medium and a large. the large could easily serve my two labradors but find that the dachshund likes it all for himself
customer_reviews.author: nelly nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easily my best pet purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easily my dog's favorite place to be. We bought this in hopes it would be comfortable enough to keep her off of the couches when we were out of the house, and it's been a success! Having had this for almost 1.5 years now, it's been easy to clean and holds up with general wear and in the washing machine. We purchased the XL for my 55-lb pitbull, and while I could have easily sized down and she'd still be comfortable, the extra space let's her burrow. If you have a burrower, snuggler, loves-soft-things pet, than this is the bed for your furbaby.
customer_reviews.author: lizm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Greyhounds are slim and boney. This keeps them up off the floor. There is tons of padding under them , it’s super comfortable and they absolutely love them. The extra large is the perfect size for them.
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: MY Buddy enjoys it!
customer_reviews.text: Took him a bit to get use to, but now he goes to it and points for us to hold it open for him to crawl in. Sometimes he sits on top. Sometimes, like the first picture, he sleeps so sound he "slides" out, remaining asleep. Great gift for my best buddy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed SCSC

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well made bed, but one reason I chose this is that it is suppose to stay open and it does not. Paid 40 for it (fluke of the day) and feel i overpaid since it does not stay open. Seems well made, but have no idea how it would hold up to cleaning/washing. My thing that was important for me was for the bed to stay open (of course it will not if they lie on top of it). I want my eight lb dog to be bale to easily craw inside of it when I am not home and it is chilly inside the house. .
customer_reviews.author: CasaDeChihuahua

customer_reviews.title: 120 lb ridgeback loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this bed. The other one ONLY tore up because my golden doodle likes to hide her ball in his (my Ridgeback) bed and dig for it (SMH). I had the other bed for 5 years. I was just going to be a new cover but figured my boy deserved a brand new bed since his sister tore his up! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nila Grier

customer_reviews.title: Dog's love it so much they'll abandon you
customer_reviews.text: My Pit Bull loves this so much that I hate it. He used to sleep in bed with me every night under the covers and it's my favorite thing. Now, I've been replaced for this cave bed. He loves this thing. I can't blame him- it's super warm and so comfortable/cushy (yes, I crawled into it a few times to cuddle with him). Whatever! Haha. Seriously though, great bed. My Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Though unsure at first I'm pretty delighted with this purchase. I have a 60lb Weimaraner who is on the smaller side so I figured the large would be perfect. When I put the bed together my heart sank; it was too small. My Weimaraner can curl up into a ball to sleep but this didn't give her as much room as I hoped. Still, I was too excited about it so I thought I'd let her try it. Turns out this bed is perfect for her. She doesn't quite understand how to climb in it by herself yet but once she's settled she's entirely comfortable. For now I just lift the top up and she crawls in.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: A nice man cave for an Italian Greyhound!
customer_reviews.text: Rocky, our Italian "Stallion" Greyhound, loves this bed. When we first unboxed it he was going crazy! Literally running into it at full speed and spinning around inside of it. We now have this mushed into his "Life Stages Fold & Carry Single-Door Dog Crate Size: Small - 24" L x 18" W x 21" H" crate and it just barely fits in there creating a warm and cozy cave for him. He used to love jumping on the couch and burying himself behind one of us to get warm, but now he just heads over to his man cave and relaxes in there...lol. He loves it so we do too!
customer_reviews.author: JRNYC05

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without them!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot tell you how much my dogs ,1 Am Staff and 2 dachshunds, love these beds! I take out the plastic hoop as my dogs love to really get in there and snuggle. All I see are noses when the dogs are in them..if that much of them.Our Staffie goes in even the medium size ,she has a bigger ones for bed time .They even get in them in the summer but see a bit more of them then. Around here we cannot do without these beds. Nothing else will do!
customer_reviews.author: rennit

customer_reviews.title: Our Dachshund likes it
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical. How many times have you bought something highly rated only to find it's not what you wanted? We have two dogs about a year old - dachshund mix. One of 18 lbs (female) and the second is larger at around 36 lbs. (male). We bought this for the smaller one, who has short legs and likes to climb under the couch and hide and sleep. Now both are really enjoying this item together. We purchased the large size.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large bed for my 60 lb dog last week. She has plenty of space in it and it's bigger than I expected (I considered the XL and am glad I went with the L). She hasn't quite figured out that she is supposed to lay inside of it and prefers to lay on top, but we're working on it! The interior is very fuzzy and leaves white fuzz all over my carpet, but I'm sure that will slow down after it gets more use. The bottom portion is very thick and fluffy - almost too "cozy." I think it freaks my dog out a little because there is so much movement/sinking when she steps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A LIFESAVER !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dashounds who always want to be under a blanket. It is exhausting getting up and down to cover them up all of the time. Plus my big dog pull the blankets off and then chew holes in it. Then the the dashounds get their heads stuck in the holes and I have to rescue them. I looked for the perfect bed and found it in this one. I got a larger size so that both of them can crawl in and snuggle. It is great! Im not hopping up and down anymore to make them comfortable. Should have done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ruggieri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed, our baby loves to be under blankets so this bed was a no brainier. However, after reading many reviews I decided to size down and get a large for my 50 pound american staffordshire terrier. I wish I would have gone with my gut and get the extra large. The circumference is large enough but the opening is not, she has a hard time getting under the top so we have to help her get in. Can't return it since she already slept in it. Update got her the x large & much better! She can actually get under with no assatance & use it how it should
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Let’s taco ‘bout it
customer_reviews.text: Hodor has had the “taco” for over a year and absolutely loves it. He sleeps in it every night, tucking himself in when the light goes off. The new pup has been caught sneaking into it on a couple occasions to take a nap after only a week. I plan to buy another for the little guy once he can get past the temptation to chew on the inside. Can’t really blame him—it really is super soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: 2 Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought me my new bed for Christmas. At first I was unsure because it didn't look like my current bed, but mommy placed me in it to try it out, and........😴😴😴😴 Woops, I'm sorry, my bed was so comfy I dozed off. I really love too snuggle in it, bury my face, hide my treats to trick mommy into give me more ... heee heee. Thank you Santa for my new bed 😍🎅🏼🐶🎄😁
customer_reviews.author: rukiddinme33

customer_reviews.title: Max loves to hide in his Cave Bed
customer_reviews.text: Max, my 6 mo old rescue loves his Snoozer Cozy Cave Pet Bed. Right now he is still in his crate at night but he uses his Cave bed during the day. Hopeful he will be able to use it at night. He love's it.
customer_reviews.author: Swanee Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my potty, and she loves it! It's beautiful, holds up wonderfully in the washer, you couldn't ask for more. Except, that for over 100.00, it's not water proof......my dog had an accident, and it soaked clear thru. There is no way to wash the fiberfill filler. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for the dogs!
customer_reviews.text: First off the bed is way bigger than what I expected! I bought the X-large for my two shibas because I felt the large would not have been big enough. This definitely fits them both with extra space to spare. It is extremely soft and warm. It also allows them to either go all the way to the back to be in the dark or stay near the front to get some light. Overall it is durable, soft and my dogs love it! I also love that I can take the cushioning out so I can wash it, if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous little taco bed! My dog loves it. He enjoys burrowing and being covered up and this bed is great. He jumps in and burrows inside and it’s so easy to clean as you can remove the outer part as it’s zippered. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: BNM

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely adores this bed. She constantly snuggles up in it, and she also sleeps on top when she gets too warm. Our cat loves it too! I really like the olive color; it's neutral without being brown and fits in with our decor. The one criticism I have is that the plastic tubing that props up the top flap has a little opening, and my corgi had that thing out in two seconds flat. We ended up just giving up on that bit and leaving it loose, which she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: Well if my dog was able to write, she would let you know how amazing this bed is. She used to sleep with us even if we tried to put her back in her previous bed. Now the story is completely different: this girl not only spends the entire night in her cozy cave but also goes there by herself when she decides it's her bedtime haha (she literally leaves us in the living room and goes to sleep). I put only 4 stars for the "easy to clean part" because of the cave shape that is not easy to wash in a washing machine. Except that, run for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: florent letronne

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Cave
customer_reviews.text: My 22lb dog (Corgi x Chihuahua) LOVES it. It took him a day to figure it out, but now will leave my lap to hop in and burrow for a nap. I did remove the fluffy bedding inside the zipper and replaced it with a few folded blankets, which he seems to like better. This is a favorite spot for him when he is home alone. He'll drag in a shoe or sock so it smells like his favorite person. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Our GSP loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little cozy cave!! We got the XL for our German shorthaired pointer after reading good things about these on a GSP Facebook group!! Our little girl loves this!! We took the plastic piece out and haven’t been able to get it back in properly yet. Would recommend. We ordered an XL and our dog is around 60lbs and she has a ton of room! It’s pretty big! But perfect for her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: ... and so we thought this bed would be a perfect way to get him to stay in his bed ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to get under the covers and so we thought this bed would be a perfect way to get him to stay in his bed and not ours. He didn't understand how to get under it at first but then once he did, oh man. He wouldn't come out. He got in so deep, we couldn't see if he was even in there. My pup is only 13 pounds but we got the Large size so he could really snuggle and move around. It's HUGE. I probably could have managed to get one size smaller and would have gotten the same effect. But i'm so happy with it and love that my dog is so happy in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Cozy cave is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these. The XL is huge but needed for my tall 75 lb Weimaraner. Easy for him to slither in to. My other two pups are taking more time to get used to. We say “get in your cozy cave” and off they go 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gray

customer_reviews.title: Terrible~ quality is sooooo bad
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. It is so bad. I have 3 kinds of cave for pet. But this cave is terrible quality. Especially poly hair is falled out so i have a concern my sweet dog will eat this hair from cave. Moreover i moved to Korea to live for some monthes here. What can i do to return it. Pole that makes the cozy cave pop up kept popping out. Returned Also is it luxury coze bed? No~ not luxury. Bad quality. Don't but it. Really~~~
customer_reviews.author: Mihyoun Park

customer_reviews.title: Yep my doggo loves this. The plastic part came ...
customer_reviews.text: Yep my doggo loves this. The plastic part came out the first day and my dog has a hard time getting inside the cave by himself, but when I hold it open for him to snuggle in, he loves it. Especially now that it's getting colder. P.s. XL is plwnty big foe my 75lb german shepherd pitbull mix. He can get inside and I could close the cave without seeing any of him
customer_reviews.author: Chong Min Lee

customer_reviews.title: A lovely product...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made but my dog was uninterested in it. I got a small for my 15 lb. dog and the pouch was small. I would recommended a large.
customer_reviews.author: karen Adele

customer_reviews.title: Snoozer Luxury Cave Pet Bed; a great space for the dog in your life!
customer_reviews.text: We bought an X-Large, olive Snoozer Luxury Cozy Cave bed for our 55 lb Blue Heeler/Australian Sheppard mix. We ordered it a lot bigger then he really needs in order to give him lots of extra space to stretch and move around and to hide his dragon and other chew toys. The Sherpa is extra soft and comfy and the micro-fiber is very soft and looks like it will hold up; the color is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: JoLM

customer_reviews.title: One of her best dog purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these dog beds. Our dogs love them too. Works great for us since we keep our room cold at night and knowing dogs they won't keep a blanket on them...so this does the job for us, consistently. Our dogs don't get cold, and they're comfortable....I would recommend the orthopedic one though. I got that for our second dog and it's a lot better support wise and more flat our old one is hard to get flat....or maybe just add some foam?
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N

customer_reviews.title: Great pig bed!
customer_reviews.text: We have two in size xl for 100 pound pigs. They absolutely love their beds. I order wrong size on one and snoozer worked with me to return no problem. Easy to clean and i expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Tribal Farm

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't keep our pup off of our bed; he'd pace and whine until we gave in. Now, he loves sleeping in what looks like a Pita Pocket. It was only a few nights before he completely stopped trying to jump onto our bed- well worth the price. Our frenchie has the large sized bed- he's got tons of space.
customer_reviews.author: OBXSCAPE

customer_reviews.title: ... and even my none burrowing terrier mix (35#) absolutely love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My burrowing dachshund mix (chunky 20#) and even my none burrowing terrier mix (35#) absolutely love this bed. They get under the cover and snuggle right in. Its large enough that they even snuggle together inside which is incredibly adorable (with room to spare)! The top didn't stay up in the beginning but with continued use it now does, making it easier for them to get under. I just washed it for the first time and it held up perfectly. Pricey but for my dogs comfort and happiness its well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingHigh

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept But Poorly Made.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these but they aren’t very well built for the price they charge. I replace them about every 6-8 months due to them falling apart. The fabric tears at the seams and the padding inside gets flattened out. It’s a great concept just cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality?  That is not the case!
customer_reviews.text: My dog deserves the best! After reading the description from the seller - a quality product was what I expected. The zipper does not zip closed, fabric was missed in the seam, and miscellaneous threads, are shredded into the seams and not clipped. This item missed the quality control. Totally unacceptable if a dog is going to be using this product - they are rough and tumble......Disappointed for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Melle

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and made very well
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and made very well! But from the pics online I got one that's a little to small. Our dog fits in it but the opening is very tight and not inviting. So he doesn't go in on his own unless there's a toy he goes in to get out. Also the nice soft material inside leaves a lot of fuzz on him and in his eyes. This may wear off once it gets warm in. I would give 5 stars if he could easily get inside
customer_reviews.author: Astorey

customer_reviews.title: Dog and senior owner love it! Takes  time to fire out how to enter!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amending this review after a month or so. Now I love it and my 22 lb pup has learned how to get inside by himself and loves it. White fluff escapes frequently and when he digs in it 2 or 3 times to get it softer, deeper, whatever -- as dogs usually do -- LOTS of fluff comes loose but that's the nature of the fabric. I haven't washed it yet but if it holds up and gets clean it's a 5 star dog bed! Had to SEARCH for hole that plastic hoop comes out of for washing - hidden on one end within the fluff. Came out easily.
customer_reviews.author: ravenous reader

customer_reviews.title: wonderful invention!
customer_reviews.text: My pittie loves his cave! He's constantly trying to get underneath blankets and this is so much easier for him! He crawls right in, and will sleep contently for hours. The bed is super soft, and the extra large size is HUGE. Twice the size of what my 60lb pound dog probably needed, but he can stretch out if he wants. Better sleep for both of us! (:
customer_reviews.author: heatherleighx

customer_reviews.title: Size is good for a fairly large dog
customer_reviews.text: Size is good for a fairly large dog. My dog is around 53 lbs but slender. She loves this bed and she feels so comforted when laying in it! The only thing I'm concerned with is that my dog sheds....and she goes way back in the edges (not at the opening) so i suspect her hair that sheds will get accumulated over time. I havent figured out how to clean it yet since I just got it, but hopefully the hair will come on with some vacuuming! Overall, dog really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: APN

customer_reviews.title: Doggies love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and goes on the couch less as a result! I have another one for my boyfriends dog and it traps hair in even after washing it. He's a pit mix, but I thought I could wash out the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Cold dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 30 lb. Boston Terrier loves this bed! I ordered the large, and he has plenty of room to snuggle up or stretch out. It could easily fit a bigger dog. He has always liked to sleep completely under the covers because he gets cold easily, but he doesn't like to wear sweaters. When we aren't home he can't get under blankets himself, so this seemed like a good fix. It took about 24 hours for him to start going inside independently, but now it's his go-to place. He has also wrestled with and chewed on it a bit and so far it has held up, where many beds don't. Very happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Myra M. Braswell

customer_reviews.title: This cozy cave bed was the perfect solution! She is about 60 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest pup is a burrower! She loves to sneak under the covers and will sleep all night at the foot of the bed which worried me (and kept me up!). This cozy cave bed was the perfect solution! She is about 60 lbs. and is very comfortable snuggled up inside it. It took a little while for her to figure out how to get in and adjust the fill to the perfect balance for her liking, but she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. My fur babies are getting used to it. It's so fluffy they aren't sure it's for them. I would like an adult size one myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky A.

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t quite figured it out
customer_reviews.text: My bull terrier isn’t the brightest but love to lay under covers he should figure it out. It seems pretty durable, but like others have said way overstuffed- better than understuffed! I took half the stuffing out and good to go
customer_reviews.author: A

product_meta.title: Snoozer Luxury Cozy Cave Pet Bed
feature_bullets: LIKE A HUG FOR YOUR DOG! Is your dog a cuddler? A burrower? The Cozy Cave dog bed is just what you’re looking for! The hooded dog bed design lets your dog snooze between layers of soft Sherpa lining for enveloped comfort and coziness. Made to appeal to a dog’s natural instincts for burrowing, the Cozy Cave is the best dog bed for dogs who love sleeping under blankets. The Cozy Cave gives them a place to relax with a feeling of safety and security for less anxiety and more restful sleep.

HAPPY DOGS, HAPPY OWNERS! Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and by that we mean both dogs who use our products and their owners. It’s no accident that we have many loyal customers who stay with us for years. Don’t take our word for it – check out the [hundreds/thousands] of 5-star reviews and positive testimonials from satisfied customers and find out how much their dogs love Snoozer!

WE DON’T CUT CORNERS. Our dog beds are built to last! When you invest in a Snoozer, you know you’re buying a top-of-the-line pet product your dog will love for years to come. Our removable dog bed covers are machine washable, so your home can stay fresh and your dog has a clean healthy place to snooze. With tons of replacement dog bed covers available, you can try out different fabrics and can keep your Snoozer longer without needing to replace it every few months!

SIZING: This Cozy Cave has a 35” diameter and a 4” sidewall. This provides space for larger breeds while still keeping the snug, enveloping feel. Please check our size chart below for our best recommendations based on breed. A thin removable plastic tube keeps the hood open for easy entry or exit and can be removed through the small hole at the corner of the hood.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
